info.title: Grabicon
info.description:
Grabicon is a free service that makes it fast and easy to get high-quality favicons from around the web, in the size you want, instantly. It can take several seconds to a retrieve a domain's favicon from scratch. We do the hard work in advance, so you get a high quality PNG image in milliseconds.

Grabicon is free for developers to use in their applications. We want to be used by as many web/mobile apps as possible.

get.description: Grab the favicon for a given domain, in the size you want.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain whose favicon you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The height and width of the icon to be returned. Grabicon will ensure all your icons are the size you requested, even if the website didn't originally have an icon of that size.
